Title: Step 5: Find the ruined barracks and locate Guardian-RX
Text: Captain Falkner has directed me to the ruined barracks inside Fort Harbenshire’s grounds, where the second phase of the test will take place. I need to locate the barracks, and the defense robot, codenamed Guardian-RX, in the barracks courtyard. This robot will serve as my 'protected' to defend in the upcoming combat simulation.
CompleteText: I’ve found the barracks, and defense robot, Guardian-RX, stationed in the ruined barracks. Time to prepare for the final test.
NextQuestTitle: Step 6: Interact with Guardian-RX to Start the Simulation
